<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script_client"><sys_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>NeedItOnLoad</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 //  alert("This message is to display that the form is loading and only after it is closed the form gets submitted.");
	
	if(g_user.hasRole("security_user")){
		g_form.disableAttachments();
		document.getElementById("header_attachment").style.display='none';
		document.getElementById("header_attachment_line").style.display='none';
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-12 16:17:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>85e7d3979746a51081fa37971153afb1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItOnLoad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_client_85e7d3979746a51081fa37971153afb1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-12 16:30:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><view/></sys_script_client></record_update>
